EnemyInfo.Name: Burrowing Dragon
EnemyInfo.Description:
Seahorse/Dragon enemy that jumps out of the ground, walks forward while shooting fireballs, and finally burrowing back underground.
The enemy needs to be placed below the ground with enough clearance for it to jump out above it. It will jump out when samus is within a certain range, which can be editted at:
$A8:DD80 ; Y range (in pixels) $A8:DCC7 ; X range (in pixels)
It will burrow back into the ground after walking forward a number pixels defines at $A8:DCCB.
